text:
20. A minimum fee of $50.00 will be charged to the tenant to unblock any sink, toilet or bath, if the obstruction is found to be caused by the tenant. If the services of a plumber are required, the fee will be the total of the plumber's invoice + 20% administrative fee.
22. Le locataire sera responsable de tout dommage causé aux lieux loués et/ou équipement.
22. The tenant will be responsible for any damage caused to the rented premises and/or equipment.
Rappel: rien de doit être jeté dans la toilette à part une quantité appropriée de papiertoilette, aucune lingette, serviette sanitaire, condom, papier essuie tout etc. Attention aux restants de nourriture dans l'évier, les cheveux/poils qui finissent par bloquer le drain. Il est recommandé d'avoir un débouchoir à toilette (plunger) en vente chez Canadian Tire, Rona, Réno Dépôt, Home dépôt, Amazon etc.
trans:
20. A minimum fee of $50.00 will be charged to the tenant to unblock any sink, toilet or bath, if the obstruction is found to be caused by the tenant. If the services of a plumber are required, the fee will be the total of the plumber's invoice + 20% administrative fee.
22. The tenant will be responsible for any damage caused to the rented premises and/or equipment.
22. The tenant will be responsible for any damage caused to the rented premises and/or equipment.
Reminder: Nothing is to be flushed down the toilet other than an appropriate amount of toilet paper, no wipes, sanitary towels, condoms, paper towels etc. Watch out for leftover food in the sink and hair, which can eventually block the drain. We recommend that you have a plunger available at Canadian Tire, Rona, Réno Dépôt, Home Depot, Amazon, etc.
